.  It is located about halfway between Pensacola and Panama City.
The closest airport to Niceville is Northwest Florida Regional Airport, located between Niceville and Fort Walton Beach.
There is no public transport in Niceville, so most transportation is by private car.

There is not much to see in Niceville, but what is there is noteworthy.

Sights include:
